snippet.title: Galacticare The Voice Beyond DLC | Releasing April 2nd
snippet.description:
Wishlist Galacticare: The Voice Beyond DLC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3334930/Galacticare__The_Voice_Beyond/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=general

Play Galacticare: https://store.steampowered.com/app/494730/Galacticare/

Follow us on tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@galacticare
Talk to us on discord: https://discord.gg/brightrockgames
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/galacticare
Check out the development blog: https://blog.galacticare.com

WAR IS UPON US. Prepare for THE VOICE BEYOND - a new narrative DLC boasting three campaign levels and even more besides!

Build, manage and optimise intergalactic hospitals! Recruit staff to satisfy the whims of various alien species, and cure their bizarre illnesses - for money! Save the (literal) Galaxy in story mode, or head into sandbox to design the hospital of your dreams.

Wishlist on PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10008023/
Xbox X|S: https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/galacticare/9pb14ld018sm
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/galacticare
